document.full_text: the overall traditional path to the derby has also been altered. trainers have to be conscious of their graded earnings. they have to train aggressively into each race, because each race actually is totally meaningful and no longer a prep. we have traditionally called prestigious races like the gotham, wood, florida derby and many others, derby preps.
document.title: the rail: earnings are king on the road to the derby
lines_and_colors: the overall traditional path to the derby has also been altered. trainers have to be conscious of their graded earnings. they have to train aggressively into each race, because each race actually is totally meaningful and no longer a prep. we have traditionally called prestigious races like the gotham, wood, florida derby and many others, derby preps.
